languages.text:
"Кутает старец тело свое в теплую шерсть,
Кутает планы свои многомудрый хитрец в покровы из тайны.
Коли желаешь зловещий ты умысел знать,
Печень вкуси хитреца вместо яда словес".

"In warm furs the old man
does shroud his body,
In cloaks of secrets woven
shrouds the sly man his plans.
To know his dire purpose,
swallow not the words of poison
but his gristle."
languages.original_text:
"Кутает старец тело свое в теплую шерсть,
Кутает планы свои многомудрый хитрец в покровы из тайны.
Коли желаешь зловещий ты умысел знать,
Печень вкуси хитреца вместо яда словес".

languages.text:
“身穿暖融融的毛皮，
老人裹紧他的身体。
编织的秘密斗篷里，
狡猾之人将计划藏在心底。
若想知道他的可怕目的，
要吞下的并不是毒药般的话语，
而是他的肉体。”
languages.original_text:
"In warm furs the old man
does shroud his body,
In cloaks of secrets woven
shrouds the sly man his plans.
To know his dire purpose,
swallow not the words of poison
but his gristle."

编织的秘密斗篷里，
狡猾之人将计划藏在心底。
若想知道他的可怕目的，
要吞下的并不是毒药般的话语，
而是他的肉体。”

languages.text:
«El anciano cubre su cuerpo
con pieles abrigadas,
y el hombre astuto esconde
sus planes en capas taimadas.
Para saber lo que trama,
no tragues sus palabras envenenadas,
sino su esencia».
languages.original_text:
"In warm furs the old man
does shroud his body,
In cloaks of secrets woven
shrouds the sly man his plans.
To know his dire purpose,
swallow not the words of poison
but his gristle."

sino su esencia».

languages.text:
「老人は暖かい毛皮で
体を覆い、
秘密を織り込んだマントで
狡猾な男の計画を覆い隠す。
その悲惨な目的を知るには、
毒の言葉ではなく、
その毛皮を飲み込むべし」
languages.original_text:
"In warm furs the old man
does shroud his body,
In cloaks of secrets woven
shrouds the sly man his plans.
To know his dire purpose,
swallow not the words of poison
but his gristle."

毒の言葉ではなく、
その毛皮を飲み込むべし」

languages.text:
"In warme Felle der Alte
hüllt seinen Körper,
In Roben aus Geheimnis gewoben
verdeckt der Listige seine Pläne.
Um seinen dunklen Zweck zu kennen,
schluckt nicht die gift'gen Worte,
sondern seinen Knorpel."
languages.original_text:
"In warm furs the old man
does shroud his body,
In cloaks of secrets woven
shrouds the sly man his plans.
To know his dire purpose,
swallow not the words of poison
but his gristle."

sondern seinen Knorpel."

languages.text:
« C'est dans de chaudes fourrures
que le vieil homme cache sa froidure,
et dans un tissu de secrets
que l'intrigant voile ses intérêts.
Pour connaître ses intentions,
ignorez ses paroles empoisonnées,
mais sondez son âme. »
languages.original_text:
"In warm furs the old man
does shroud his body,
In cloaks of secrets woven
shrouds the sly man his plans.
To know his dire purpose,
swallow not the words of poison
but his gristle."

languages.text:
"Sıcak kürklerle bedenini
saklayabilir yaşlı adam.
Sırlarla örülmüş bir perdeyle
planlarını gizleyebilir sinsi adam.
Zehirli sözlerini değil de
Öğrenmek için gıllıgışını,
omurgasını boydan boya yutmalı bir adam."
languages.original_text:
"In warm furs the old man
does shroud his body,
In cloaks of secrets woven
shrouds the sly man his plans.
To know his dire purpose,
swallow not the words of poison
but his gristle."
